item.title: Canadian Media Outlets Help Whip Up U.S. Invasion Fears
‘Equal Representation’ Should Mean Equal Representation for American Citizens
item.description: Restoring a citizenship question to the U.S. census would help rectify imbalances in congressional representation.

item.title: Jon Kyl, a Persuasive Advocate of Defense
item.description: The former Arizona senator, who is withdrawing from public life, was an admired legislator who understood the limits of diplomacy alone.

item.title: The Supreme Court Must Find the Courage to Defend the Truth on Women’s Sports
item.description: The Supreme Court can either protect women as a real, distinct class, or it can green-light the erasure of women’s spaces and sports. There is no midd...

item.title: In the Abortion Industry, ‘Access’ Now Matters More Than Care
item.description: Mail-order abortion drugs are redefining medical standards — and not in a good way.
